website_summaries.verdict: This super-affordable back stretcher may not be adjustable like other contenders on the shortlist, but many users report instant relief without the need for hard plastic nodes or deep arch angles.
cons: Some reports of increased back pain
Arch angle is not very deep

customer_reviews.title: Helps with deep abdominal breathing
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this to use lying down to stretch my back. However, one of the other reviews mentioned using it in a chair so I decided to try it that way. It is fantastic for posture. The minute I lean back against it, my back curves where it should which causes my abdomen to expand with each breathe as it should. The effect on my breathing is wonderful. I know it is sold as a back aid but it should also be listed as a deep breathing aid. And I have noticed that when I get up from the chair to do other things, my posture is much better. My spine feels great and I even feel taller.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: warning should be included
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what it was claimed to be and therefore no complaint there. The problem, however, is especially for someone with back pain and in particular spinal issues such as degenerative disc disease, spondylosis, etc..., any issues with a presently less than healthy spine, there should definitely be a warning included in all marketing information. The item is simply way too hard, way too rigid and way too high of an arch for safe use by someone with any of these issues. I sincerely believe you could make such condition(s) worse and my experience was it simply is way too painful to be of any practical use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Helps stretch back, between chiropractic visits
customer_reviews.text: When you have back issues, something you can do at home is stretch your back. It does help & can reduce chiropractic visits (especially if you have limited ins coverage). You can adjust up & down how you lay back on this arch to work on the area needed. I would call is a gentle solution, it is not extreme. For the most stretch, hands/arms up over your head, so if you need to start smaller, work up to using your arms. Good assisting solution for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Sad but did not work out...
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired doctor of chiropractic. And I thought when I saw this that it would work well. It is rather comfortable to lay on but it ended up making my back, mid back problem worse instead of better. The angles not right and it stands too high. Anyway, and unfortunately, I had to send it back. One of the very few things that Amazon sold me That didn’t work out so well. Of course it wasn’t Amazon’s fault. The idea was good but they’re gonna have to tweak it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have spinal stenosis and find myself bending forward to walk. I really did not expect much from this product but thought it was worth a try for the money. I spend 20 minutes a night using the stretcher and it has made a big difference. When I first get on it is somewhat painful and I have to raise my head with pillows. Within 5 minutes or so the pain goes away and I can lower my head somewhat. Still cannot rest my head on the floor, but perhaps that's not any more effective. This works for me. I'm not perfect but can stand straighter and walk without pain if I use the product faithfully.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, good back stretch.
customer_reviews.text: This works fairly well for a nice stretch in the back. I sometimes use it the opposite position, depending on where my pain and muscle stiffness are. It could be wider, might be more comfortable or easy to stay on it , but that may hinder the "stretch" you get. Having the middle hollow for the spine helps relieve any pressure on the bones and gives them a nice impact free break while you lay on it. ( personal retail purchase)
customer_reviews.author: Dana D.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product mainly because I could not use the inversion tables. I thought this would work just as well as the table and it did. It costs less, takes up less room, and is easy to use. I am doing as the instructions say and taking it slow, just laying on it maybe 2 minutes each morning and working up to more. Pain relief has not been that noticeable, but I am hoping after I build up the minutes it will help. Great quality product. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Janise

customer_reviews.title: but this one is the most comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as advertised. I bought three different back stretchers, but this one is the most comfortable and effective. It is well-made, is luxuriously cushioned, and the groove has ample space for the spine. I like the fact that I can move the stretcher to different parts of the spine to get all the kinks out. I sure would buy it again. I want to add that the more I use this item, the better I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Heywood

customer_reviews.title: Well Made; Compact; Useful for Lumbar or Thoracic Spine Therapy.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, Worthwhile addition for your spine/back pain "toolbox." The "Wide" end can be situated under - lower back - lumbar area for Lumbar L & S vertebra, and it can be reversed - Wide end under - upper back -Thoracic spine for the T vertebra. You can find several user demo videos on Youtube, as there are no instructions included...otherwise, use your brain and instinct to figure it out. This is meant to be used on Floor, Therapy Table, or other hard surface. Take Care!
customer_reviews.author: Just Curious

customer_reviews.title: Life-Changing
customer_reviews.text: I found this quite by accident when looking for a pillow that I could put behind my back while sitting to relieve constant pain from spinal stenosis. This has changed my life. As long as I get up each morning and stretch my back over this for a few minutes, I have little to no pain and have been able to stop wearing my back brace. If you have spinal stenosis, try this!
customer_reviews.author: Niked

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke?
customer_reviews.text: Extremely uncomfortable. We have all tried this device and everyone who has feels like it's the most uncomfortable thing they have ever experienced. Some even ask if this is a joke. The price was cheap enough that it wasn't worth trying to return especially since there are rumors now that amazon will cancel your prime account if you return to many items. Maybe amazon should consider testing the items they allow for sale on their site if they really cared how quality these items really are.
customer_reviews.author: J Sencott

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So my package arrived the same day with other items I purchased and I have a buldging disc from a lumbar fracture last year and this Back stretcher works wonderfully. It’s easier for me to relax on it than my inversion table and I plan on using twice a day before and after my workouts. I am very active and into fitness and I have bad posture from injuries from sports and I have multiple sclerosis as well so.. yes.. this is an awesome stretcher super comfy and I just use it on my Pilates mat or even the floor would work! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: -KayKay-

customer_reviews.title: ... the computer a lot with upper back problems gets painful after a while
customer_reviews.text: Sitting at the computer a lot with upper back problems gets painful after a while. After laying on this for a little while, I'm ready to go again. I had an identical one before and accidentally sat on it (not a good idea!), so this is a replacement. Keep in mind that if you're new to using this kind of back device, it will be painful at first - but the more you use it, the more comfortable it becomes. It's definitely effective!
customer_reviews.author: dagsan

customer_reviews.title: Back stretcher works to release pressure from your spine.
customer_reviews.text: I got this back stretcher due to I have low back pain. I use it when I feel pressure on my low back. I use it when I'm not in pain. you can really feel the pressure release. Stay on it for about 10 to 15 mins and slowly get up after you roll to your side. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Syd S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok.....BUt
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me at 210 pounds. As good as Chiropractor............BUT my 270 plus brother in law gave it a try and crushed it. Not manufacturers fault, probably should state a weight limit on instructions somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: I've already recommended it to some of my friends
customer_reviews.text: Now, every time my back feels a little weird, I lay on this thing for a bit. I do have to put a large pillow under my head, and even then, I can't lay on it very long, but I haven't had a problem with my back since I've had it. I've already recommended it to some of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a test run
customer_reviews.text: Every day I lay on this thing for over ten minutes. This back stretcher did not relieve my lower back pain. Lying on this device gave me a lot more back pain. After a week of using this I became concerned that I might injure my back, so I had to stop. It was also becoming difficult for me to get up off the floor after using this, because my back hurt so much. I see all the five star reviews. If this device actually helps some people, that is terrific. But I personally did not have a good experience with it. For me, it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cat Street

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Painful
customer_reviews.text: This back stretcher is very uncomfortable. It doesn't feel like it's stretching my back so much as it just simply hurts. One time I felt my back pop but everything was so painful, it was a pleasant sensation. I would like to return this. I've read a lot of reviews of people loving this but I certainly found it simply painful. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Benjilali

customer_reviews.title: VERY helpful for my sore back!
customer_reviews.text: When used for brief periods (5-15 minutes max), this thing is incredibly helpful! I find myself needing it less frequently over time because it has helped me so much. It is reasonably well made, too. There are no downsides to this great gadget. It has really helped me a lot!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable back stretcher
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with my upper back and can't afford frequent trips to a massage therapist, so after reading the reviews, I decided to give this back stretcher a try. I haven't been able to use it a whole lot yet, but the little I have seems to be helping. I don't get the "cracking" some have said they get when lying down on it, but the stretch feels good. I do notice some muscle pain when I first get up from using it, but that quickly disappears and I feel it is helping. I would definitely recommend this stretcher to others and hope it will continue to help with more frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: I haven't looked back and have really enjoyed it. My back is much more limber and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had back problems for some time. My chiropractor suggested that I look for a back stretcher. I saw this one on Amazon and thought I would give it a true. I haven't looked back and have really enjoyed it. My back is much more limber and I don't have problems like I used to. I stretch in the morning and evening. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: delegate

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective for Me
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one of these before, and try to use it regularly. I bought another for a friend. The more I put the time in, the more I can tell. If you can commit to two 10-minute sessions each day you likely will feel the difference. Of course, it depends what your back problem is. I have scoliosis with a partially crushed disk, in constant pain, and definitely appreciate this device. My only complaint is it seems designed for a taller person. I'm 5'5", and don't fit over it completely. However, it definitely works on me. I would recommend it, especially for the low price I've been seeing it at recently.
customer_reviews.author: Don E Baun

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective back stretcher
customer_reviews.text: Really like this simple but effective device. The gap in the middle allows the ribs to support your weight when using providing a stretch that cannot be attained by other means, i.e., yoga rolls or support devices
customer_reviews.author: Steven C

customer_reviews.title: Get this now...and the back magic
customer_reviews.text: I alter between this device and the back magic, both are great...different angle stretch in this one ... Gets more of your chest and the pads are nice...little need for a chiropractor with these 2 devices, and no sciatica since using these a few times a week...I've been happily using this for several years now and have gifted several...everyone loves them
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tight Muscles - A Nightmare for Ankylosing Spondylitis
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this works for some people with standard back issues. I have ankylosing spondylitis, however, and it did nothing but cause me severe pain. No relief, temporary or otherwise. Just horrid pain while I was on it and hours afterwards. I gave it to my friend who gets tight muscles in her back from stress. It worked great for her. For that I will give it three stars. Otherwise I would be giving it one star for the torture it put me through.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: it feels so good to lie down on this and get a gentle ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it feels so good to lie down on this and get a gentle traction and stretch. I suffer from unidentified sciatica. I have terrible hip and leg pain. I've had surgery but it didn't work for me. This item is slowly helping me to feel better and be more functional. I really checked out all of the products similar to this one and this was the best price I found. Why pay more? This does the job beautifully and it's actually comfortable to lie on because it's cusioned.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Clay Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This works great. No need to purchase expensive one.
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a few days, but it's been great. After stretching my back a few times a day (about 5 min. per use with pillow for my head), I am able to sleep through the night without waking up fron this dull pain I normally have on my lower back and legs. I am thankful.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: BAD IDEA!
customer_reviews.text: Not that this product is bad, It is well made and do the intended. Bad idea!, Do not do it. Even, I was very careful, I have some permanent damage to my back since I use it. There are other methods to release the back pain. Also, if you read this: RESEARH FLAT EARTH too
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Torres

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not super
customer_reviews.text: I tend to have chronic lower back pain due to my extremely poor core muscles. Stretching my back at the end of the day provides some relief from this. With that in mind, I purchased this product. It *does* feel good to lay out on it, however I wasn't able to lay in any different positions like other reviewers had specified they had. It can be a bit uncomfortable at first, but you get used to it. Not sure I would recommend buying it. It works, yes, but I could probably get just as good of a stretch from doing something manually. Interesting concept, but not a big WOW for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cannady

customer_reviews.title: Good product for me
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the price, I would say. Seems structurally sturdy. Attractive. I used it several times and thought it was doing good things. One of my vertabrae quietly popped, which is always a good thing. I have a tendency to slouch, especially when I'm on the computer, so I'm excited to have this to stretch the other way a couple of times a day. I also used it on my couch to support my back, it was a good solid back support . . my couch is pretty deep so I usually use a pillow, and this was better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen N

customer_reviews.title: great price, good item, very poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: Nice back support but shipped only in the original box so the box arrived beat up, opened and filthy. It is a gift so not sure how I am going to make this look presentable. The item itself wasn't damaged though and the price was okay. I own one of these for myself so know it will be a good investment for one of my family member's tired backs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Relieves nagging pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these fur several years. Everytime my son comes to visit, he uses it. I finally decided to order him one of his own. He loves it. It is easy to use, and relieves that nagging pain in the middle of my back.
customer_reviews.author: edh123

customer_reviews.title: Helps Significantly
customer_reviews.text: I was originally thinking of an inversion table. Unfortunately, I don't have room for one. This is much more compact, and it is easy to use. It has helped my lower back pain significantly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springs

customer_reviews.title: I have a really bad SI joint injury and lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings on this product. I have a really bad SI joint injury and lower back pain. Sometimes it feels good and sometimes it hurts me when I use it. I haven't been using it because I don't need to feel worse. I should give it another try and use it on a regular basis to see if it works but as far as right now, it is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Love it because it gets the areas of my back ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it because it gets the areas of my back that I cannot stretch with regular back exercises. There's just something about that spot between the shoulder blades and the upper back that can be tricky to stretch out without getting Pilates involved. It's now become part of my back stretching routine. I also like how it gave tips on turning slightly to stretch the ribs as well. You can also shift this around to specific areas of your back that may need more of a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: soccerchick

customer_reviews.title: I'm still learning how to use this for best results, but I'm getting the hang of it
customer_reviews.text: I get what some would call a catch in my back.I do this especially on first getting out of bed in the morning, I'm still learning how to use this for best results, but I'm getting the hang of it..I would suggest some illustrations on best position and instructions how to use it.Trial and error not a real good idea when messing with the back, I know one position it made my legs go cold and numb, so I won't do that again..I also have an inversion table that I also use sometimes in conjunction but realized not at same time.
customer_reviews.author: johnmenville

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stretcher!
customer_reviews.text: If you've not used this, you're missing out. I love it! I've got a couple of herniated disks that I used to get traction and physical therapy for. Once I got a little better, I was sent home with other exercises and this as a recommendation. It works like a champ! If you've got a lower back issue, put this on your phone and show the picture to your doc. It might be just right for you, too. It's also great for overall stretching and this little gadget is now quite popular at my house.
customer_reviews.author: A ChristyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great tension relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I loaned a similar wooden one to a friend, and it wasn't returned. That's fine, because this one is so much better. The cushioning is soft but firm, with no pressure on your spine. After lying on it for few minutes, I can feel my body start to relax as tight muscles relax. You'll find you're stiff on it at first, then gently your body adjusts to your spine being in alignment. Great for back, neck, shoulder pain, or general stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: lauri

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for light stretching
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for a light stretch of back and neck. I like that you can vary the arch by using the wider or narrower end. Lightweight but durable.
customer_reviews.author: SUNIL

customer_reviews.title: You have to move it till you find the best position. PT has me use it for 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I go to PT for my neck and back and this is one of the devices they use on me. I bought one for home. The smaller end goes toward your head. You have to move it till you find the best position. PT has me use it for 10 minutes. At home I use it from 10 up to 30 minutes. Its a little uncomfortable at first but you get used to it and it really helps relax my back and ease the pain.
customer_reviews.author: BASS

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I like it, and I get the idea. However, for someone who workouts frequently and has a strenuous job, I need something the gets much deeper than this. It's an alright stretching device, but don't expect to solve all of your issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very easy way to improve posture
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many spine and back products and this one has got to be one of my favorites. It's lightweght-easy for travelling with it. I spend 15-30 minutes a day on this and it has helped to stretch my shoulders, pecs, abs, back muscles and my knee pain even went away (it was likely L3 related). This is a very easy way to improve posture, especially if you work a desk job or sitting a lot. I've bought 4 more for family.
customer_reviews.author: BSN2MBA

customer_reviews.title: Also great as computer chair support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this five years ago and have used it intermittently since. As my posture has worsened lately, started using it more regularly with good results - but discovered how great it is as back support in a chair. It keeps my shoulders from rolling forward as I sit at a computer. I am ordering another one to keep at my office for my desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Israel

customer_reviews.title: bought 3
customer_reviews.text: i bought three of these. one for myself and two for my sons. we all have back problems. absolutely love them!!! excellent way to strertch those tight muscles. i lay on mine for 10-15 min w/ legs straight and can feel the tightness leaving. wonderful for this 64 yr old back!!! boys like theirs too..........families also use on occasion. my only suggestion, put a pillow under your head. having osteoporosis it is quite difficult to lay my head down witthout some support.
customer_reviews.author: jkk

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable and I am able to sleep through the night ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything. I noticed a difference in my back right away. It is very comfortable and I am able to sleep through the night on it without pain. I can feel the stretch in my back and my stomach flattening at the same time. I was debating about other products on amazon but they all complained of discomfort so I opted for this one for cushion and it feels as if you are laying on an elevated pillow.
customer_reviews.author: David Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works Well with...
customer_reviews.text: I combine this with my swing machine under my ankles and a large pool noodle under my neck. It brings about a relaxation that would be great after a hard days work or you find yourself having difficulty sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: eyewrist

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago and still use it. I won't lie -- it hurts when I first lay on it. The back muscles will eventually loosen though. I can even feel when the spasms give way. Usually it takes 10 minutes, but once in awhile it will take 15. It's much easier to sleep when the back isn't in a knot!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: This has really worked for me, my back pain is gone
customer_reviews.text: I've had back pain for years, of and on, that always felt like it needed a good stretching. I tried stretching over the back of chairs, the arms of couches, and using one of those large inflatable balls, but never really got a satisfactory result. After the first try on this, I felt better than I can remember. Be careful though, this does do a pretty serious stretch (at least for me, I'm 5'6", might be less severe on taller people), and I had to ease into & off of it.
customer_reviews.author: spencerberus

customer_reviews.title: Mini-backbend bench bargain
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mini-backbend bench. It reminds me of Iyengar yoga wooden backbend benches ---- they're big --- about 6' x 2' --- and $$$. I move back and forth on this stretcher (head to toe direction) depending on what I want to stretch. It's very comfortable and hides under the furniture when not in use. Good for heart-opening. Sometimes I put one end up on a yoga block to get more height. I'm still experimenting with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Buyer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: my husband had previously used another product as seen on tv. he prefers that but says this one stretches almost as well.. he has arthritis in his spine due to an old injury and using a stretcher seems to give him relief
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: The stretcher feels therapeutic
customer_reviews.text: I like the form and softness of this stretcher, it allows a wide angle of stretching back, shoulders and arms. It is not rigid, which is important for people with low back problems. I would recommend to start with short stretchers of a minute or two to allow your body to adjust to a new position. and then after some time use it as long as you feel is right.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Avdiushko

customer_reviews.title: Great for my upper back problems
customer_reviews.text: I have upper back problems and I'm always trying to pop my back. This product actually works pretty well. My back probably pops about 75% of the time that I use this back stretcher. But even more than that, it provides a great stretch for my upper back muscles. I usually position it a little higher up my spine to stretch the upper muscles, and I'll just lay there for about 2-5 minutes. I got this, thinking it was worth trying to see if it would pop my back, but my expectations have been far exceeded.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor has a version of this that’s $250... this one is just as good and gives equal pain relief and stretch to my low back. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mreenstringbean

customer_reviews.title: IT's okay and was a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have no carpeted floors, and it says use only on carpeted surface. The instructions are less than minimal. I do get some relief when I use it--but since I really had no directions on use, I place it on my mattress, sit with it touching my rump, stretch my arms above my head and lean back (this requires help as my back hurts--duh). I have tried it under my side, but that seems to increase my pain. Better instructions would be a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Steinert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The reason i give it a 5 is quite simple. Its quality is well made.It does what it advertised. I have mid back pain,and this product has helped stretch my back and alleviate quite a bit of the pain and soreness. It doesn't take long to do. The reason i purchased this model over some of the other products here was simple.This one is padded. I definitely recommend this product if your looking for a product to stretch your back out with.
customer_reviews.author: AlTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: My best back strecher
customer_reviews.text: I have bought quite a few back stretchers but this one seems to work best for me. It is easy to use and really helps my back pain, strain. I honestly do not use my other back stretchers since this one really works well.
customer_reviews.author: happygal1

customer_reviews.title: Quality Economical Back Stretcher
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband due to chronic back pain. This is a quality made product, affordable, easy to use and small enough to store out of sight. Yes, it does the job. We bought an inversion table and ended up selling it because this takes up a lot less room and work much better. Great product also for those who can't use an exercise ball. This is one product you will want to have and use on a regular basis for back pain.
customer_reviews.author: 1LuckyGurl

customer_reviews.title: This helps stretch it out and feel a little better. It's pretty uncomfortable to start like other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Just figured out I have sciatica issues. This helps stretch it out and feel a little better. It's pretty uncomfortable to start like other reviews said, but I'd buy it if you want to be able to stretch out at home and have some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Bayley

customer_reviews.title: Great device for Lower Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: I have had back pain and problems for a long time and I have found that stretching is the best thing to help keep things under control. This back stretcher does a great job at stretching the lower back. This is a pretty strong stretch and it may take some people time to get used to it, but this combined with other stretching will help relieve lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this little gadget saves on my trips to the chiropractor's (and I love my chiro!). Easy to use, easy to store, it's high quality for the price. The padding is very comfortable, and in only 30 seconds to a minute my spine adjusts itself from "out of joint" to "working order". Now that it's shipped directly from Amazon using Super Saver, it's a great gift as well as a cheap fix! I can't speak from your perspective, but this arched lumbar stretcher extender has a permanent place in my house.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: really helps
customer_reviews.text: helps to release pain in my back. I used 10 15 minutes daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Alday

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: They have plastic ones, don't buy them. This one is padded and much more comfortable. It's your back take are of it.
customer_reviews.author: teeatta

customer_reviews.title: Ended Up in the Yard Sale Pile
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I buy things I wish later I'd never found on Amazon. This was one of those things. I wouldn't necessarily say it was junk, but it didn't really help the back issues and it was 1 more thing I had to deal with later when it started collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: James Madison

customer_reviews.title: The one I need. To help the back, ...
customer_reviews.text: The one I need. To help the back, I really need a very very stiff and hard support. This is it. and I ordered 5 pieces for my car, office, desk, one on the bed, and one on the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed as this back stretcher has helped me get through school studying with good back support. (The only thing I would add is don't rely on it 100%), meaning don't use it all the time, all day long etc. otherwise your abdominals will become weak(er). So use it when you need some support, or lay on it on the floor and stretch out. It's great and I recommend for all ages, especially older, if can handle some extension.
customer_reviews.author: ARE

customer_reviews.title: ... Lumbar Vertebrae will line up which provides me with great pleasure as well as relieves the pain
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use the Arched Back Support my Thoracic & Lumbar Vertebrae will line up which provides me with great pleasure as well as relieves the pain. It also helps me to walk better when it causes the Sacral Vertebrae to move back into position.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest H. Harris III

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item - But could get better stretch
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality item - well built, sturdy, and adequately padded to be comfortable. If you have ever stretched your back laying backwards over a large exercise ball, this does not give you as thorough of a stretch. The advantage to this piece of equipment is that you can watch tv or read while you are on it. Difficult to do when you are laying over an exercise ball! Also, this stretcher is compact and easy to store. If you are looking for a lighter stretch, this is a great buy. I did not experience this cracking my back as other buyers have indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid; best short to mid-height
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this thing, even though it's not a perfect fit. Very comfortable to me, and helps corrrect my slumping. I use it in combination (after a short break) with back exercises and hamstring, psoas, and glute stretches. Also a few core exercises. I'd prefer a more extreme and longer convex shape because I'm tall, but if I slide up and down and relax into it, it works pretty well. These are everywhere for around $20 now.
customer_reviews.author: GahDoor

customer_reviews.title: Also it helps that she is not a heavy load like me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my wife. She loves it so far. The operative words are so far. I have some concerns about the durability of the stitching and construction. This is simply a concern since she has only used it a few time. Also it helps that she is not a heavy load like me.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder God

customer_reviews.title: Instant Relief.
customer_reviews.text: Do not debate whether to buy this product. My lower back has been bothering me for almost a month nonstop. Well, I figured - I will order and give it a try. If it doesn't work out I will just return it. Well I tried it the first night I got it. I have not had pain since. I know this sounds unlikely. But it only took one time and I felt my back crack just like a chiropractor would do. I would highly recommend. It sure helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Key Largo

customer_reviews.title: chiropractor approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help my son in his rehabilitation from spinal surgery. He doesn't find it too comfortable, maybe because he is too short, but I like it. It's really comfortable if you find the right position on the lower spine and make sure you have a pillow under your neck. I haven fallen asleep laying on it. Our chiropractor really liked it. He was going to purchase one to take with him when he does house calls.
customer_reviews.author: M. McConnell

customer_reviews.title: VERY HELPFUL
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah, baby! This really helps relieve tension on those physically straining days. I kind of wish I had thought of the design first. If you carry stress in your shoulders, neck and back, and can't find relief, this will help. Just follow the easy instructions and boom, you can feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brumley

customer_reviews.title: Better than my $3,000 massage chair I hate to say
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple yet effective device. I play golf often and other exercises such as surfing so it's nice to be able to use this to stretch the back in a static position. I don't have a back injury per se, but this just feels great to use. II even used it in my car today just to see though that isn't really what it's for. While it's fine without a pillow, I recommend using a pillow with this device. I'm a big guy and it supports me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for good posture
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Doctor of the muscles and joints. I tell my patients to by this brand of arch because of great value and design. I use mine every day to maintain a healthy posture.
customer_reviews.author: Bazlyn

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my household to use. We all love it. My lower back can really hurt after garden work. This gives my back a good stretch. I wake up feeling great. I have not had the popping of the spine that some have experienced. My sister used it, and her lower back pain went completely away. My problem is more chronic. But it helps tremendously. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: beautiful me

customer_reviews.title: Wow, did I receive this item at the speed of light!  SUPER FAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is nicely fabricated and works great! Not only that, I ordered on Sunday (using REGULAR shipping) and received it early Monday morning! SUPER FAST!!! Love that and definitely made my day! Happy camper all the way! My back feels great and this item will definitely last better than those cheaply made plastic items claiming to do the same! Price is Right too.... Highly recommend!!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Farmerz Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy little gadget. It does not look like much, but it does put your back through the ringer. I had to ease into it. After two or three days, my back felt quite better. Still hurts at work, but at least I can get through the mornings without pain. I still can't decide which end is up.
customer_reviews.author: Patty V

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Have used every day for 2 months and has held up to my 200 lbs. It seems to be helping better than the physical therapy I paid alot more to do.
customer_reviews.author: longtimetrucker

customer_reviews.title: It helps a little
customer_reviews.text: I tried this back stretcher due to all the great reviews. It helped a little but I like my foam roller better a little better. It seems to do a better job and is similar in price. I picked up an inversion table in the end which gives a much better stretch although it costed $100 and takes up way more space in my house
customer_reviews.author: Tony and Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great product for back health. Love how easy to use and compact.
customer_reviews.text: I have had back problems for years and the older I get the harder it is to crack those spots in my back that cause tension. I purchased this back stretcher and the first time I tried it out I was able to pop the spots in my back I haven't been able to for a long time. I felt instant relief. Its a great sturdy product. Says it supports up to 250 lbs but I'm closer to 300 and it held up fine. You can use it on your side as well to get the hips and more stretched. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I could sleep on this
customer_reviews.text: Nice for stretching but if you're looking for something to help you crack your back this probably isn't the tool for you.
customer_reviews.author: Glamournaut

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: love this thing. great stretching and it’s got me doing sit-ups as well, it’s like training wheels for crunches.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Marquee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I agree with the other reviewers that you may need something behind your head depending on where you place it under your back. I vary where it goes - from sacral/lumbar all the way up to cervical, and it works wonders. I love it, so glad I purchased it. I was worried about the quality for how cheap it was but it is very well made. Highly suggest!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-Duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother-in-law who suffers from artheritis in her lower back. She's always in pain. She goes to the ER occasionally, so I got this. Doctors suggest narcotics. Its working. She can place it on the bed-she even fell asleep while laying on it. I am a weight-lifter and it really relieves pain.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nahorniak

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have lower lumbar and sciatic nerve pain that flares up every year or so. Laying on this instantly relieves the pressure and aligns things so pain eases up. It's not painfully hard and is padded well with a dip to keep your spine from being bruised from laying on it. It's sleek black appearance makes it ok to leave lying around. It's lightweight and small enough for travel. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney82

customer_reviews.title: Posture support
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a backrest while watching tv, makes me sit up straghter, better posture
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Once I got used to using it, I found it very helpful for stretching out my back. It feels like I grow an inch taller after using it for 10 minutes. I also use it for doing sit-up/crunches sometimes and it helps reduce the ass/back stress of those exercises. >>> If you have serious back problems, or if you are unfit / overweight, you will want to check with your doctor before using this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Deasy

customer_reviews.title: Best Back Stretcher!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, he lays on it after his basketball games. He uses it for about 5-10 minutes at a time. I tried it, and i realized that i can do leg lifts easily with this because it took the pressure off my lower back. With this, I can now do 20 minutes of floor leg exercises without being uncomfortable on my tail bone.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lang

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased and surprised that such a simple, inexpensive object could actually deliver. Every time I use this, I can feel the vertebrae popping back in line. I have had much less low back pain and sciatic nerve pain since I bought this. Nothing beats an hour long massage and a chiropractic adjustment, but a hot bath and a few minutes on the back stretcher is a great alternative and is very budget-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: J. SIMMONS

customer_reviews.title: Relieves tension in lower back! Male and Female.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, relieves tension in lower back if used properly as for duration of 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Handyman Inside

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I broke my back about ten years ago. I am always in some kind of back pain, either too stiff, pinched nerve or inflamed. I woke up this morning after a rough workout last night, totally in pain too stiff to get out of bed. There was a knock at my door and there was this little back stretcher just in time. I saw it and thought "yeah right, that's so not exiting looking"..but after one second that thing brought me sooooo much relief! Ans after a few minutes I got up, my back snap crackle and popped and I actually felt energy after such a great stretch. Happy customer! It's so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bohlouli

customer_reviews.title: North American Health + Wellness Back Stretcher - Arched Design for Superior Stretch, Black
customer_reviews.text: Great product! it works as advised. Great buy! I use to stretch and back support while seating. Hard and sturdy, well build. I loved. It really works for me. Looking forward to buying another one when back in the office.
customer_reviews.author: A.G   North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: When I use this back stretcher, sometimes my back will crack. It helps when you are in a chair hunched over your desk all day to stretch between the shoulder blades. Helps also to stretch your arms over your head. Was priced right to give it a try. My husband doesn't care for it but I have a lot of back problems and am happy I got it. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my friend who has ongoing back pain and who also happens to be a very large person. When we ordered this we were concerned that it would not be sturdy enough to support his weight-in fact, he was convinced it would not. However, when it arrived he was quite pleasantly surprised to see that it is in fact very sturdy-it doesn't bend or flex at all under his 300+ lbs. He now uses this almost nightly to stretch his back, and says it is very effective at relieving some of the chronic aches and pains he struggles with. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: kmg

customer_reviews.title: This product is very good for computer back (sitting hunched over a computer 8+ ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for thoracic pain. after using this for about a month, the bi monthly visits to the chiro were eliminated. Havent been back to the chiro in 6+ months. This product is very good for computer back (sitting hunched over a computer 8+ hrs a day). Dont wait until you are in unbearable pain. Use this morning and evening for a theraputic stretch.
customer_reviews.author: clock

customer_reviews.title: Will help with siatic nerve pain
customer_reviews.text: I use it at night. I turn side ways and place one end under my hip. It relieves my siatic nerve pian. Works also as instructions say for about thirty minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: A physical therapist recommended this. It is just what I needed for ...
customer_reviews.text: A physical therapist recommended this. It is just what I needed for stretching my upper back, and my husband used it to stretch his lower back. Two friends have tried it out and wanted to know where I bought it...they want one also, and may have already purchased it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it looks like.
customer_reviews.text: It works well for minor back stiffness, and it's great to lay on when you wake up or get off work. In my experience with it, it doesn't help much for back pain. You have to slide up and down until you find the right spot, which is easy, but tedious. Would I recommend to a friend? Definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Bosing

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, great price...
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from back pain, this is the product for you. Save yourself hundreds of dollars in therapy and doctor visits and buy this simple product that will help you stretch, relax, and restore your spine to it's natural position. (You should first consult your doctor to ensure the type of movement required to use this product is appropriate for your health situation).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Horkavy

customer_reviews.title: Good for slouchy sitting people
customer_reviews.text: This is good for your back, it helps stretch your spine but it is a little painful when you first lay on it. Do it slow and let your back stretch slowly. Just remember to use it! My chiropractor said its a good product to use for slouchy people since it stretches you the opposite way you sit.
customer_reviews.author: Lana F.

product_meta.title: North American Health + Wellness Back Stretcher - Arched Design for Superior Stretch, Black
product_meta.description: Helps Relieve Pressure Helps Relieve Aches & Pains Increases Flexibility Improves Posture Padded for Firm Yet Comfortable Support Gently stretches and relaxes muscles Retail boxed Manufacturer: Complete Medical Size: 4 X 11 X 2.75 Made in: United States Product type: Back & Neck Therapy
feature_bullets: RELIEVE PRESSURE alleviate neck and back pain with quick stretches, experience instant satisfaction while loosening back muscles
MAXIMIZE FLEXIBILITY consistent use will increase back mobility, sooth: spinal arthritis, herniated disks, stress fractures & more
IMPROVE POSTURE eliminate slouching, back stretcher will gently bridge and relax muscles to compliment spinal alignment
ARCH DESIGN innovative positioning gives superior stretch, with firm padding that permits comfortable use and therapeutic results
LIGHT-WEIGHT always stay loose, with convenient design, back stretcher is the perfect on the go relief
